comment: A closed interval in ` RR ` is compact. Alternate proof of ~ icccmp using the Heine-Borel theorem ~ heibor . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
